duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage hardware development projects, from concept to production, ensuring adherence to timelines and quality standards.
Lead and motivate cross-functional teams, including hardware engineers, product managers, and supply chain specialists, to achieve project goals.
Drive product lifecycle management, including cost optimization, quality improvement, and continuous innovation.
Assess and mitigate risks related to hardware development and supply chain, ensuring smooth project execution.
Collaborate with stakeholders to align hardware development strategy with business objectives and market demands.
Communicate project status, risks, and opportunities to senior management and drive strategic decision-making.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Engineering or related field (Master's preferred)
